CustomField.description: Indicates whether the Case record is a student record Case.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK($Setup.sfal__SAL_Settings__c.sfal__Advisee_Record_RecordType__c), false, IF( CONTAINS( $Setup.sfal__SAL_Settings__c.sfal__Advisee_Record_RecordType__c, "." ), $Setup.sfal__SAL_Settings__c.sfal__Advisee_Record_RecordType__c == RecordType.NamespacePrefix & "." & RecordType.DeveloperName, ISBLANK(RecordType.NamespacePrefix) && $Setup.sfal__SAL_Settings__c.sfal__Advisee_Record_RecordType__c == RecordType.DeveloperName ) )
CustomField.label: Is Student Record
